title: diseaseObjectRelation
description: An entry that describes the relationship between disease object, relationship and inferredGeneAssociation

objectRelation.description: Constrains the disease object, associationType and inferredGeneAssociation - for genotype, must have is_model_of relation and optional inferred from gene list.  some genotype/fish models may have no affected gene.

oneOf.title: Genotype
oneOf.description: is_model_of can only be applied when objectType is GENO/organism

inferredGeneAssociation.description: list of inferred gene/marker association that can be made based on the DB object ID

oneOf.title: Gene/marker/transgene
oneOf.description: is_model_of can only be applied when objectType is genotype or organism level annotation, other conditions can use one of the following relationship types to describe the association.  Allele is broken out so that inferredGeneAssociation can be recorded.

additionalGeneticComponents.description: list of additionalGeneticComponent objects that together with the dbObjectId, represent a 'genotype.'  Only to be used for SGD, FlyBase and WormBase
